AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Kansas: state of origin for a suspicious vehicle's license plate and destination for narcotics
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alpine, Texas: area where a recent narcotics smuggling operation was detected, location where Border Patrol Agents were stationed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Big Bend National Park: part of the area being patrolled by Border Patrol Agents, included in the 140-mile area of the United States/Mexican border, where vehicle sensors detected northbound vehicles
